## [1.1.0] - 2023-09-25

<h3 id="110-api">API</h3>

<h4 id="110-api-added">Added</h4>

* Adjust the property names returned by  `useI18n` 
   *  `$t` -> `t` 
   *  `$setI18n` -> `setI18n` 
   *  `$i18nState` -> `i18nState` 


## [1.0.0] - 2023-09-09

<h3 id="100-api">API</h3>

<h4 id="100-api-added">Added</h4>

* Add basic implementation for  `createI18n`  and  `useI18n`
